Event.name: An Incubus
Event.text: While exploring you encounter an incubus. After conversing a bit you learn that he is very interested in ancient artifacts.

event.text: Amazed by your Necronomicon, he decides to join you so he can study it.

choice.text: Ask him if he knows anything that may help you in conquering this region.

event.text: Upon browsing his books, he shows you a curious block of text.

effect.additionalText: It teaches you how to Provoke!

choice.text: Offer a minion in exchange for an artifact.

event.text: You offer one of your own, the Collector graciously accepts and gives you an artifact from his collection.

choice.text: Offer an artifact in exchange for another artifact.

event.text: You offer one of your own artifacts, the Collector graciously accepts and gives you an artifact from his collection.
You steal one of the Collectors artifacts.
You ask if the collector has any artifacts that he can spare.

effect.additionalText: Feeling generous, he accepts your request.
Offended by your request, he shoos you away.

event.text: You venture inside, not knowing what you will find.

effect.additionalText: Your minions exit the Pyramid in a panicked state. Your Lead minion is nowhere to be found. The others say that he got lost.
Your minions exit the Pyramid holding a gold plated necklace. It's the fabled Ankh of Anubis! This will prove useful.

choice.text: Send a thief into the Pyramid.

event.text: The thief ventures into the Pyramid, and finds the fabled Ankh of Anubis! This will prove useful.

Event.name: Sacrificial Altar
Event.text: At the end of this dungeon, you stumbled upon an altar. It looks like you can perform rituals here.

event.text: You performed a ritual using the Necronomicon. The altar blessed you with a new ability, Sacrifice.

choice.text: There's nothing you can do here. Leave.
